metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6627 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The Audio component in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48Z and 6.0 before2015-12-01 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via acrafted audio file, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature orSignatureOrSystem access, aka internal bug 24211743.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
